content: What is the expected behavior for a FHIR Questionnaire Group item set with read-only? Should all of that groups children be read-only? Also similiar question what is the behavior for nested .items for non groups?
That's an excellent question for us to clarify. Can you submit a change request? We'll discuss on one of our Thursday questionnaire calls.
@Lloyd McKenzie Change requests go through here https://jira.hl7.org/ ? I requested a user creation for an account with email chesslunatic@gmail.com
